resources.string: Sample app is running in the background.
WorkManager sample is running in the background.

This sample app demonstrates how to use foreground services on Android 16.

It shows two ways to create and run foreground services: the standard way using a Service, and the WorkManager way of using a long-running worker.

Select one of the samples:

This sample demonstrates how to use foreground services on Android 16.

It will start a foreground service to fetch last known location and to observe any updates to the location.

It also shows how to bind to a service to update UI.
This sample demonstrates how to use WorkManager to run expedited work on Android 16.\n\nIt will start a foreground worker to fetch last known location and to observe any updates to the location.
